newsitem.title: USA: MGE wheat closes lower on late sag in CBOT soy.
newsitem.headline: MGE wheat closes lower on late sag in CBOT soy.

text.p: A late sag from the day's highs in the CBOT soybean market pressed MGE spring wheat futures to a lower close, traders said.
The market was buoyed early on the rally in soybeans, and when soybeans began to falter from limit to near-limit gains, speculators started selling MGE, KCBT and CBOT wheat futures, the traders said.
MGE spring wheat futures closed three cents per bushel lower to 3/4 higher, with May down three at $4.09-1/2.
Estimated volume on spring wheat was 33,007 lots while feed barley had a turnover of one lot.
July barley closed unchanged at $6.60 per cwt.
